resourceTemplates.name: filtered-users
resourceTemplates.title: Filtered users
resourceTemplates.description: Flexible user listing: filter by any supported property. Example filters: startswith(displayName,'Arthur'), department eq '[departmentName]', accountEnabled eq true, etc. Replace {userFilter} as needed.

resourceTemplates.name: filtered-security-groups
resourceTemplates.title: Filtered security groups
resourceTemplates.description: Search Microsoft 365 security groups using a flexible filter. Example filters: startswith(displayName,'AI'), securityEnabled eq true, mailEnabled eq false.

resourceTemplates.name: list-group-members
resourceTemplates.title: List group members
resourceTemplates.description: List all members of a Microsoft 365 group by providing the group ID. Use in combination with the 'Filtered security groups' template.
